semantic relationships.from sentence: In this work , the idea is to solve this issue by taking advantage of the semantic relationships between senses included in WordNet , such as the hypernymy , the hyponymy , the meronymy , the antonymy , etc .

observation.from sentence: Our method is based on the observation that a sense and its closest related senses ( it s hypernym or it s hyponyms for instance ) all share a common idea or concept , and so a word can sometimes be disambiguated using only related concepts .
